message.body: Hi! If youre going to the studio today will you do me a favor and check that no one has taken the pedestal from under my pieces. And if it's still there could you pretty pretty please move it into the ceramics room, and if its not there could you let me know, please?
yeah, i'll be there in like an hour!
Wwtttfff my name was on it!
the paper with your name is stuck under the wall pieces. sorry i missed your call, i was in the darkroom!
